verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:1
verses.text: Moreover, brethren, we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:2
verses.text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:3
verses.text: For to their power, I bear record, yea, and beyond their power they were willing of themselves;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:4
verses.text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift, and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints.
